comment.author: daveg
comment.text:
This was changed a while ago (September 2008). The original problem was that NH didn't support using the reflection optimizer with generic entities as the base class. The change was to turn it off only if a generic entity was found.
Assuming NH still has this restriction I think this is the best we can do. Of course if this restriction is removed we can take this out. Does anyone know what NH is doing with this?
